Insurance Enrollment Mapping Agent

Streamline your insurance enrollment data processing with AI-powered mapping, validation, and vendor-specific output generation.

Phase 1: Data Intake & Template Building

Upload client files, generate column descriptions, and create editable mapping templates

Key Features:

  • CSV/XLSX Upload
  • AI Column Analysis
  • Template Creation
  • Export Formats
Get Started

Phase 2: Template & Master File Mapping

Map client data to master enrollment files with auto-mapping and manual overrides

Key Features:

  • Auto Column Mapping
  • Manual Overrides
  • Validation Rules
  • Error Handling
Get Started

Phase 3: Enrollment Processing & Neon Integration

Process enrollment data, handle errors, and generate Neon SQL blueprints

Key Features:

  • Data Validation
  • Error Processing
  • Vendor Outputs
  • Neon SQL Generation
Get Started

Phase 4: Blueprint Management

Create, manage, and reuse mapping blueprints for different clients and vendors

Key Features:

  • Template Library
  • Instance Management
  • Import/Export
  • Version Control
Get Started
